summary: This document contains due diligence research results for the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH. The findings indicate no significant negative media or legal alerts associated with the foundation, and it includes details about the foundation's business profile and location.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: J. Epstein is the founder of the Virgin Islands Foundation, which is the subject of the due diligence research.

persons.name: Reena Chandwani
persons.context: Reena Chandwani prepared the due diligence report and is responsible for confirming the results.

persons.name: Paul Hoffman
persons.context: Paul Hoffman is mentioned as a prior employee associated with the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3 St Thomas, VI 00802-1348
keyFacts: The due diligence report found no significant negative media or legal alerts related to J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.
The foundation is located at 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3, St Thomas, VI.
Paul Hoffman is noted as a prior employee of the foundation.
The report was prepared by Reena Chandwani on June 19, 2017.
The document emphasizes the importance of compliance and verification of the data provided.
